Data Fields
pmhalModule Struct Reference

Structure defining the MODULE definition. These parameters define the properties of a module and allow to configure, read status and traverse the tree. More...

#include <hw_pmhal_data.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t clockDomainId
 
uint8_t retentionType
 
uint8_t pmhalPrcmSysConfigModId
 
uint8_t maxClock
 
uint32_t clkCtrlRegAddr
 
pmhalClockSelConfig_t * clkSelCfg
 
uint8_t isStandbySuported
 
uint8_t moduleMode
 
uint8_t edgePropertyEnum
 
pmhalPrcmCpuId_t cpuId
 

Detailed Description

Structure defining the MODULE definition. These parameters define the properties of a module and allow to configure, read status and traverse the tree.

Field Documentation

uint32_t pmhalModule::clkCtrlRegAddr

Clock mode register address.

pmhalClockSelConfig_t* pmhalModule::clkSelCfg

List of all clock select configuration belonging to this module.

uint8_t pmhalModule::clockDomainId

Clock domain ID to which this module belongs to. Refer pmhalPrcmCdId_t for more details.

pmhalPrcmCpuId_t pmhalModule::cpuId

CPU ID. It can take any of the values from pmhalPrcmCpuId_t

uint8_t pmhalModule::edgePropertyEnum

points to the edge Property of this Module

uint8_t pmhalModule::isStandbySuported

Flag indicating whether standby protocol is supported for this module.

uint8_t pmhalModule::maxClock

Number of clocks.

uint8_t pmhalModule::moduleMode

Bit map indicating the capability of module - Enable, disable, automatic. It can take any of the values from pmhalPrcmModuleSModuleMode_t.

uint8_t pmhalModule::pmhalPrcmSysConfigModId

SysConfig module ID for the given module.

uint8_t pmhalModule::retentionType

Module retention type.
